title: Define Course Outline and Structure
description: Create a detailed course outline with modules, lessons, and learning objectives for the web development course.

title: Record First 3 Modules
description: Create and record video content for the first three modules covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript basics.

title: Create Course Materials and Resources
description: Develop downloadable resources, code examples, and practice exercises for each module.

title: Set Up Course Platform
description: Choose and configure the online learning platform, upload content, and set up payment processing.

title: Launch Marketing Campaign
description: Create and execute a marketing strategy including social media, email campaigns, and content marketing.

title: Establish Base Running Routine
description: Build a consistent running schedule of 3-4 times per week, starting with 3-mile runs.

title: Complete First 10K Run
description: Successfully complete a 10K (6.2 mile) run without stopping, building endurance progressively.

title: Increase Weekly Mileage
description: Build up to running 20-25 miles per week while maintaining proper form and preventing injury.

title: Complete 15-Mile Long Run
description: Successfully complete a 15-mile training run to prepare for the half marathon distance.

title: Taper and Race Preparation
description: Reduce training volume, focus on race strategy, and prepare mentally for the half marathon event.
